title: Style tk list output with colors and icons
description: Update cmd/tk/cmd/list.go table output to use lipgloss. Add: colored status icons (○/●/✓/◐/⊘), colored priority (P1 red, P2 peach, P3 green), colored type (epic purple, bug red, feature teal). Keep column alignment. Preserve --json flag behavior.
closed_reason: Updated list.go with colored status icons, priority colors, type colors, and dim header
